channel.title: Something REALLY needs to be done about this!
channel.description:
PLEASE give mods the power to delete topics
Im sick of seeing this. [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2j2g39j.png[/img]

item.title: Something REALLY needs to be done about this!
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Deleting a topic is like recycling one piece of paper, virtually.

Read full topic
item.source: Something REALLY needs to be done about this!

item.title: Something REALLY needs to be done about this!
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

I do delete many topics that you just don’t notice.
I’ll start deleting more topics and dropping pms instead of locking and replying because I do agree that a mass a locked topics does look shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Something REALLY needs to be done about this!
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:5, topic:341042”][quote author=faded vision link=topic=437437.msg3214667#msg3214667 date=1274575565]
Yeah, the majority of these will be people posting in the wrong section or advertising.

Not deleting the topic is letting the offending advertiser get away with it IMO :>
[/quote]

The moderator locking the topic should have removed the advertisement, if not, drop em a message, it is in our moderator guidelines. ;)[/quote]
I have told cookies before

Read full topic
